title: BONUS: A Message from Bobby on Movie Mike's Movie Podcast: Most Re-watchable Christmas Movies!
itunes:title: BONUS: A Message from Bobby on Movie Mike's Movie Podcast: Most Re-watchable Christmas Movies!
description:
Movie Mike's Movie Podcast: Subscribe Wherever you listen to podcasts! Just search 'Movie Mike'

To get you in the holiday spirit, Mike and Kelsey are breaking down some of their favorite Christmas movies. Kelsey loves Christmas and gives her Top 5 movies she watches every single year. Mike isn’t the biggest fan of Christmas movies…but gives his list for movies that have Christmas in them…but aren’t exactly Christmas movies. Plus a movie review of Hulu’s “Happiest Season” starring Kristen Stewart, Mackenzie Davis, Alison Brie, Aubrey Plaza, and Dan Levy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
